thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express Earls Court - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good standard, modern budget hotel
thread.title_full: Good standard, modern budget hotel - Review of Holiday Inn Express Earls Court, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Chris L
title: Good standard, modern budget hotel
text:
Start with the weakness: this location is not great for most of London but it is good for Earl's Court and the exhibition center. If you are on a budget it's an option but there are more central options at similar prices if you book ahead.
On the positive side it's everything you need from a good budget overnight stay. Everything looks new and clean, staff were welcoming, rooms are quite and comfortable, breakfast was more than adequate.
I can't give it 5 stars because the location is where it is, but it's a good option if you are on business at the shows.
